description: height in relation to a certain reference point; (general) distance measurement, usually in the vertical or up direction, between a reference datum and a point or object. The reference datum also often varies according to the context

description: state of extreme dryness, or the process of extreme drying
yearly period of low rainfall, especially in the tropics
structure found in some plants (division Magnoliophyta / angiosperms) to support reproduction
wood which has been dried in a kiln or oven

solid phase extraction sampling technique that involves the use of a fiber coated with an extracting phase, that can be a liquid or a solid, which extracts different kinds of analytes from different kinds of media, that can be in liquid or gas phase

method to separate compounds based on their relative solubilities in two different immiscible liquids, usually water and an organic solvent; extraction of a substance from one liquid into another liquid phase

water that has had many of its impurities removed through distillation
